title: Provisions applicable to special funds
context: ยง37-52 Provisions applicable to special funds. All special funds maintained by all departments, commissions, boards, agencies, and establishments of the State shall be governed by this chapter, provided that departments and establishments shall not be authorized to make expenditures out of any special fund in excess of the moneys available in the special fund. [L 1957, c 320, ยง2; Supp, ยง35-14.6; HRS ยง37-52]
